brief: This is a simple Saw Wave Oscillator.

methods.name: amp()
methods.desc: Change the amplitude/volume of this sound.

methods.name: freq()
methods.desc: Set the frequency of the oscillator in Hz.

methods.name: pan()
methods.desc: Move the sound in a stereo panorama.

methods.name: stop()
methods.desc: Stop the oscillator from playing back

description: This is a simple Saw Wave Oscillator.
name: SawOsc
